Choose one of the following: HIST202, or HIST223.

HIST202 simultaneously satisfies GE D1.

HIST223 simultaneously satisfies GE D2.
Choose one of the following: ENGL133, or ENGL134.
Choose one of the following: COMS101, or COMS102.
Any Free Elective course can go here. Recommended: Foreign Language 101.
Choose one of the following: COMS201, COMS208, or COMS226.

Choose one of the following: PSY201, or PSY202.

PSY201 and PSY202 simultaneously satisfy GE E.
Any Free Elective course can go here. Recommended: Foreign Language 102.
Any Modern Language (103-level) course can go here. Refer to the catalog.

One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, B1, B2, Upper-Division B, C1, C2, Lower-Division C Elective, Upper-Division C, D1 or D2 (depending on whether HIST203 or HIST223 is selected in support), F, and GE Electives (8). Upper-Division B and Upper-Division C should be taken only after Junior standing is reached (90 units). Upper-Division C cannot be fulfilled with COMS courses. Refer to the online catalog for GE course selection and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR).
